channel.title: War on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in War on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Civilians
item.description: There are two videos that are related in a way. One is an old Ukrainian man showing destroyed military mashinery column part right around shattered village Another is Ukrainian civillians who have maneged to talk-off a column to take a route not through their living place I watched the first one only and the man curses alot. He praises Ukrainian military and curses Russian military. While showing his house is destroyed by Ukrainians right with Russian mashinery.
